briefTitle: Safety and Efficacy of Cariprazine for Mania
officialTitle: A Double-Blind, Placebo-Controlled, Evaluation of the Safety and Efficacy of Cariprazine in Patients With Acute Mania Associated With Bipolar I Disorder
summary: The objective of this study is to evaluate the efficacy, safety, and tolerability of cariprazine monotherapy versus placebo for the treatment of acute manic or mixed episodes associated with bipolar I disorder.

primaryOutcome.measure: Change From Baseline in the Young Mania Rating Scale (YMRS) Total Score at Week 3
